original_text: So Jehoshaphat and his men went to take things from the dead soldiers. They found a lot of weapons, clothes and other valuable things. They took as many things as they could carry. There were so many things that it took them three days to take them all away.
korean_text: 여호사밧과 그의 백성이 가서 적군의 물건을 탈취할새 본즉 그 가운데에 재물과 의복과 보물이 많이 있으므로 각기 탈취하는데 그 물건이 너무 많아 능히 가져갈 수 없을 만큼 많으므로 사흘 동안에 거두어들이고

sentences.original_text: went to take things from the dead soldiers
They found a lot of weapons
They took as many things as they could carry
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들이 가질 수 있는 만큼 많은 물건들을 가져갔다

sentences.original_text: that it took them three days
